mods.abstract: Assuan barrage (long view) at Assuan; group of Egyptians, some with baskets and sticks on the shore of the Nile (foreground) barrage and cataract of the Assuan Dam and turbulent waters of the Nile (middle ground); mountain range and small town (background); untitled print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
